dataset.name: contract_sql
dataset.sql:
${ " SELECT " + " a.contract_id, " + " a.contract_code, " + " a.contract_amount, " + " a.gross_margin, " + " a.gross_profit_margin, " + " a.terms_of_payment, " + " a.terms_of_warranty, " + " a.contract_start_time, " + " a.contract_end_time, " + " a.training_or_outsourcing, " + " a.other, " + " apply.project_name, " + " apply.project_code, " + " apply.category, " + " apply.estimated_contract_amount, " + " apply.estimated_gross_profit_margin, " + " contract.project_id, " + " u1.NAME AS projectManagerName, " + " u4.NAME AS salerName, " + " u4.login_name AS salerLoginName, " + " s5.NAME AS salerOfficeName, " + " a.id, " + " a.create_by, " + " a.create_date, " + " a.update_by, " + " a.update_date, " + " a.remarks, " + " contract.proc_ins_id, " + " contract.proc_status " + " FROM " + " project_contract_item a " + " LEFT JOIN project_contract contract ON contract.id = a.contract_id " + " LEFT JOIN project_apply_external apply ON apply.id = contract.project_id " + " LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = contract.project_manager_id " + " LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = apply.saler_id " + " LEFT JOIN sys_office s5 ON s5.id = u4.office_id " + " WHERE " + " a.del_flag = \'0\' " +
(emptyparam("pc")==false ? "and apply.project_code like concat(\'%\', :pc, \'%\')" : "") + (emptyparam("pn")==false ? "and apply.project_name like concat(\'%\', :pn, \'%\')" : "") + (emptyparam("cc")==false ? "and contract.contract_code like concat(\'%\', :cc, \'%\')" : "") + (emptyparam("qb")==false && emptyparam("qe")==false ? "and a.update_date BETWEEN :qb AND :qe" : "") + (emptyparam("qb")==true && emptyparam("qe")==false ? "and a.update_date <= :qe" : "") + (emptyparam("qb")==false && emptyparam("qe")==true ? "and a.update_date >= :qb" : "") + " ORDER BY " + " a.update_date" }
